alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pennington and east central Weston Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Redbank Spring Campground, or 13 miles northeast of Newcastle. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Redbank Spring Campground around 340 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
